H0.text: After the murder of his children's nanny, Sandra Rivett, Richard John Bingham disappeared on 8 November 1974, was presumed deceased on 11 December 1992 and declared legally dead in October 1999. By what name is he better known. Lucky Lucan

H1.text: After the murder of his children's nanny, Sandra Rivett, Richard John Bingham disappeared on 8 November 1974, was presumed deceased on 11 December 1992 and declared legally dead in October 1999. By what name is he better known. Richard Bingham

H2.text: After the murder of his children's nanny, Sandra Rivett, Richard John Bingham disappeared on 8 November 1974, was presumed deceased on 11 December 1992 and declared legally dead in October 1999. By what name is he better known. The Earl of Lucan

H3.text: After the murder of his children's nanny, Sandra Rivett, Richard John Bingham disappeared on 8 November 1974, was presumed deceased on 11 December 1992 and declared legally dead in October 1999. By what name is he better known. Lord Lucan

A4.text: Richard John Bingham, 7th Earl of Lucan (born 18 December 1934 â€“ disappeared 8 November 1974, declared dead 27 October 1999), commonly known as Lord Lucan

A5.text: Lucan was declared legally dead in 1999, and a death certificate issued in 2016 allowed his titles to be inherited by his son George
